item.description:
Get your Network Marketing Business Off to a Fast Start!
Don’t Miss This Incredible Opportunity To Launch Your Home Based Business in 2012!!.
Here’s just some of what you will learn…

■How to Develop a Millionaire Mindset!
■Staying Focused on a Daily Basis!
■5 Goal Setting Secrets And How To Hit Them
■Set your schedule for Success
■138 Tax Secrets For Home Based Business Owners You MUST Know To IMMEDIATELY Increase Your Cash Flow!
■Marketing - reaching out methods, networking, home parties, health fairs, sampling, maximizing pharmacy cards usages and more...
■The simple system - Invite, Expose, Close, 3way phone calls, edification, role playing, facts tell - stories tell, set your goals for 2012 and beyond!
■And Much, Much, More!

This event costs $25.00 - Visit - http://90forlife.ning.com/events/gsg-bootcamp to register!
item.name: Business Bootcamp
